filename: All who are thirsty CH in D
title: All Who Are Thirsty
lyrics: Brenton Brown | Glenn Robertson Tempo - 54 | Time - 6/8
All who are thirsty all who are weak
Come to the fountain dip your heart in the stream of life
Let the pain and the sorrow be washed a - way
In the waves of His mercy as deep cries out to deep (we sing)
As deep cries out to deep
As deep cries out to deep
As deep cries out to deep we sing

raw_text:
All Who Are Thirsty
Key - D
Brenton Brown | Glenn Robertson Tempo - 54 | Time - 6/8
VERSE
D F#m7
All who are thirsty all who are weak
G2 Em7 D/F# G2
Come to the fountain dip your heart in the stream of life
G2/A D F#m7
Let the pain and the sorrow be washed a - way
G2 Em7 D/F# G2 G2/A
In the waves of His mercy as deep cries out to deep (we sing)
CHORUS 1
D D2 Dsus D G2 G2/A (3X)
Come Lord Je - sus come
D D2 Dsus D G2
Come Lord Je - sus come
CHORUS 2
D D2 Dsus D G2 G2/A (3X)
Ho - ly Spir - it come
D D2 Dsus D G2
Ho - ly Spir - it come
INTERLUDE
Em7 D/F# G
As deep cries out to deep
Em7 D/F# G
As deep cries out to deep
Em7 D/F# G G2/A
As deep cries out to deep we sing
ENDING
D D2 Dsus D G2 (D) (Last time)
Come Lord Je - sus come
